courses.title: Introduction to Programming
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of programming using Python. This course covers basic syntax, data structures, and problem-solving techniques.

courses.title: Data Structures and Algorithms
courses.description: Explore essential data structures and algorithms including arrays, linked lists, trees, graphs, sorting, and searching.

courses.title: Database Management Systems
courses.description: Study the design, implementation, and management of database systems including SQL, normalization, and transactions.

courses.title: Web Development
courses.description: Learn modern web development technologies including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and popular frameworks like React.

courses.title: Computer Networks
courses.description: Understand the principles of computer networking including protocols, network architecture, and security.

courses.title: Software Engineering
courses.description: Learn software development methodologies, design patterns, testing strategies, and project management.

courses.title: Artificial Intelligence
courses.description: Explore AI concepts including machine learning, neural networks, natural language processing, and computer vision.

courses.title: Cloud Computing
courses.description: Study cloud architecture, services, deployment models, and hands-on experience with major cloud platforms.

courses.title: Cybersecurity
courses.description: Learn security principles, cryptography, ethical hacking, and strategies to protect systems and data.
